text: Stanisław Jan Konturek (8 October 1931 – 8 August 2019) was a Polish physiologist and gastroenterologist. He was a member of the Polish Academy of Sciences and the Polish Academy of Learning from 1986 until his death in 2019. He was a professor at the Jagiellonian University Collegium Medicum. He was born in Zakliczyn, Poland. Konturek died on 8 August 2019 in Kraków, Poland at the age of 87.Nie żyje prof. Konturek, wybitny fizjolog i gastroenterolog ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Polish academics Category:Physiologists Category:Polish physicians
title: Stanisław Konturek
